name: The Dimensional Tear
description: (W,A,S,D to move) Play as Dawson a teenage boy as he comes to terms with his fathers death and learns to deal with his new step father in a fascinating way.  (This is a college project where we had to use a tweet and make a game from it. The tweet I got was "By climbing up the top of a supermarket you can reach a parallel universe. It is filled with kites.")
